title: All the Best Apple Deals to Shop Before Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days Ends
description: Including an iPad that's on sale for less than $200.
excerpt: Amazon Prime Big Deal Days are here, and you can save big on Apple products, including AirPods Max, iPads, Apple Watches, and AirTags.
text: Apple AirPods Max Everyone deserves a pair of headphones that are as chic as they are functional. Right now, these are almost $200 off, so they’re worth adding to your cart ASAP—especially if you prefer an over-ear style. Apple iPad (9th Generation)This 9th generation iPad is on sale for its lowest price ever recorded, coming in at just under $200–a discount of more than $125 off. This iPad comes with Wi-Fi capabilities, an HD camera, and so much more.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowApple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop Updated with a faster M3 processor, Apple’s 2023 MacBook Pro is designed to offer enhanced graphics and performance over previous models. If you’ve been waiting for a sign to upgrade your everyday laptop, this steep discount is it.Apple AirPods (3rd Generation) On sale for the low low price of just $130, these classic earbuds offer plenty of premium features like seamless Bluetooth connectivity and 30 hours of battery life at a budget-friendly price.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowApple 2022 MacBook AirIf your laptop is on its last legs, there’s no better replacement than the ultra-lightweight MacBook Air. This 13-inch computer weighs just 2.7 pounds, making it easy to tote to and from work, class, your local coffee shop, you name it.Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Gen)Whether you wear them while working out or during your commute, these wireless, noise-canceling earbuds deliver top-tier sound quality.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowApple Magic Keyboard This case turns your iPad into a laptop while also giving your investment some welcome protection. Not only does it have a fantastic keyboard, but it comes complete with a trackpad.Apple iPad Mini (6th Gen)Don’t let this tablet’s tiny footprint fool you: This is the perfect device for watching Netflix on the go, devouring your latest literary fiction read, or jotting down notes at the office.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowApple Pencil (2nd Generation)Save on this chic stylus (now just under $90) that turns your iPad into the world’s smartest notebook. The pencil charges via a magnetic connection to your iPad, so it will be juiced up whenever inspiration strikes. Apple AirTag 4-PackLost luggage is a thing of the past with Apple’s ingenious AirTags, which give you peace of mind by tracking the location of your prized possessions. Snag a four-pack so you can stash one in your wallet or on your keychain.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowApple Magic TrackpadIf you prefer the trackpad on your laptop to a traditional mouse, grab this larger version to use alongside an external monitor. The battery life on this rechargeable device lasts for weeks. Apple Magic KeyboardWhile you’re leveling up your desk setup, it only makes sense to grab a new wireless keyboard. Think of all the work you’ll get done, especially knowing you can type on both your computer and your iPad with this Bluetooth model.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowApple 2023 iMac All-in-One Desktop Computer Working from home is a whole lot easier with an iMac. Your eyes will appreciate the larger display, and your wallet will be grateful for the Prime Big Deal Days discount.Apple AirPods 4If you’re the type who demands the latest tech, you’e in luck. The Airpods 4 that launched mere weeks ago are already on sale for October Prime Day. Grab them ASAP before they return to full price. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowApple Watch SE (2nd Gen)Track your steps, check your notifications, and play music right from your wrist with the top-rated Apple Watch SE. And while you’re at it, snag a new watch band so you can style your fresh tech gadget for any occasion.Apple Watch Series 9 [GPS 45mm] Track your steps, check your notifications, and play music right from what we think is the best smartwatch on the market. Don’t forget to snag a new watch band to style your wearable for any occasion.Madison McGee is a lifestyle editor for Hearst Magazines. She can usually be found reading, exploring New York’s many indie bookstores, cheering on the Baltimore Ravens and the Ole Miss Rebels, or wishing she was lying on the beach.Sarah Maberry is a commerce writer for Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty and pop culture. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level. When she’s not writing for Cosmopolitan, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, House Beautiful, Town & Country, Delish and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
html:
Apple AirPods Max

Everyone deserves a pair of headphones that are as chic as they are functional. Right now, these are almost $200 off, so they’re worth adding to your cart ASAP—especially if you prefer an over-ear style.

Apple iPad (9th Generation)

This 9th generation iPad is on sale for its lowest price ever recorded, coming in at just under $200–a discount of more than $125 off. This iPad comes with Wi-Fi capabilities, an HD camera, and so much more.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop

Updated with a faster M3 processor, Apple’s 2023 MacBook Pro is designed to offer enhanced graphics and performance over previous models. If you’ve been waiting for a sign to upgrade your everyday laptop, this steep discount is it.

Apple AirPods (3rd Generation)

On sale for the low low price of just $130, these classic earbuds offer plenty of premium features like seamless Bluetooth connectivity and 30 hours of battery life at a budget-friendly price.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Apple 2022 MacBook Air

If your laptop is on its last legs, there’s no better replacement than the ultra-lightweight MacBook Air. This 13-inch computer weighs just 2.7 pounds, making it easy to tote to and from work, class, your local coffee shop, you name it.

Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Gen)

Whether you wear them while working out or during your commute, these wireless, noise-canceling earbuds deliver top-tier sound quality.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Apple Magic Keyboard

This case turns your iPad into a laptop while also giving your investment some welcome protection. Not only does it have a fantastic keyboard, but it comes complete with a trackpad.

Apple iPad Mini (6th Gen)

Don’t let this tablet’s tiny footprint fool you: This is the perfect device for watching Netflix on the go, devouring your latest literary fiction read, or jotting down notes at the office.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Apple Pencil (2nd Generation)

Save on this chic stylus (now just under $90) that turns your iPad into the world’s smartest notebook. The pencil charges via a magnetic connection to your iPad, so it will be juiced up whenever inspiration strikes.

Apple AirTag 4-Pack

Lost luggage is a thing of the past with Apple’s ingenious AirTags, which give you peace of mind by tracking the location of your prized possessions. Snag a four-pack so you can stash one in your wallet or on your keychain.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Apple Magic Trackpad

If you prefer the trackpad on your laptop to a traditional mouse, grab this larger version to use alongside an external monitor. The battery life on this rechargeable device lasts for weeks.

Apple Magic Keyboard

While you’re leveling up your desk setup, it only makes sense to grab a new wireless keyboard. Think of all the work you’ll get done, especially knowing you can type on both your computer and your iPad with this Bluetooth model.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Apple 2023 iMac All-in-One Desktop Computer

Working from home is a whole lot easier with an iMac. Your eyes will appreciate the larger display, and your wallet will be grateful for the Prime Big Deal Days discount.

Apple AirPods 4

If you’re the type who demands the latest tech, you’e in luck. The Airpods 4 that launched mere weeks ago are already on sale for October Prime Day. Grab them ASAP before they return to full price.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen)

Track your steps, check your notifications, and play music right from your wrist with the top-rated Apple Watch SE. And while you’re at it, snag a new watch band so you can style your fresh tech gadget for any occasion.

Apple Watch Series 9 [GPS 45mm]

Track your steps, check your notifications, and play music right from what we think is the best smartwatch on the market. Don’t forget to snag a new watch band to style your wearable for any occasion.

Madison McGee is a lifestyle editor for Hearst Magazines. She can usually be found reading, exploring New York’s many indie bookstores, cheering on the Baltimore Ravens and the Ole Miss Rebels, or wishing she was lying on the beach.

Sarah Maberry is a commerce writer for Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty and pop culture. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level. When she’s not writing for Cosmopolitan, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, House Beautiful, Town & Country, Delish and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
